Nokia's Ovi Maps en bijbehorende locatiediensten zullen volgens Steve Ballmer ` breed worden ingezet' binnen Microsofts zoekmachine Bing. Dat gebeurt niet alleen op Windows Phones, maar ook in andere Bing-diensten, zoals op pc en tv. Telco-vriendelijk Steve Ballmer nodigde ook Nokia-topman Stephen Elop uit op het podium. is on it! People do like going to the movies to see the occasional kick-ass chick. But authentic female comic book heroes have a history of blowing out at the box office. Look at Catwoman and look at Electra, two big female action movies that tanked creatively and financially, says Borys Kit of Heat Vision blog. incident as`` a small event'' which only gained significance because the PM was expected at the hotel. He said incidents of Mr Gbagbo's supporters attacking UN peacekeepers are common in Abidjan. Youth who gathered when they saw the UN cars had no idea Mr Raila Odinga would be coming to the venue, he said in a telephone interview with Daily Nation. Mr Salim Lone said both Mr Gbagbo and his rival claimant to the presidency, Mr Alessane Alassane Ouattara , warmly received Mr Raila Odinga when they separately met the PM

LONDON( AFP)- British Prime Minister David Cameron began looking for a new media chief Saturday to replace Andy Coulson after he quit over a tabloid phone-hacking row, in a test for the nine-month-old government. So far, our worst day in government, a senior David Cameron aide told The GuardIan Edmondson after Andy Coulson quit Friday, bowing to pressure over what he knew about hacking at the News of the World( NOTW) when he was its editor.
